nodes.text: Espo Armor was the standard issue armor wore by members of the Corporate Sector Authority Security Police. It consisted of a brown padded jumpsuit with an impact-resistant helmet.

The armor was primarily geared towards protecting the security officer from physical impacts rather than energy blasts, as a shot from a blaster could punch right through it. The visored helmet included a retractable breathing filter and headset comlink, as well as headphone hearing protection.
